58976.summary: Some customers in Elkford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58976.title: Mar 14 - Elkford | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours.  We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
